item.sql: SELECT dus_rctrl_pwd doorpwd, dus_flag dooravoid FROM dor_door_user_set

SELECT CONCAT('c_',odd_id) AS id, odd_seq as seq, odd_name AS name, CONCAT('c_',odd_parent_id) AS pid, null as deviceType, null AS icon FROM sys_org_dept_dtls WHERE odd_data_auth = 1 START WITH odd_id = :cusNumber CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_parent_id=odd_id
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT('c_',abd_area_id) AS id, abd_seq as seq, abd_area_name AS name, CONCAT('c_',abd_parent_id) AS pid, null as deviceType, null AS icon FROM com_area_base_dtls START WITH abd_cus_number = :cusNumber AND abd_area_id IN ( SELECT dcd_area_id FROM dor_door_control_device WHERE dcd_cus_number = :cusNumber AND dcd_target_type = 2 GROUP BY dcd_area_id ) CONNECT BY PRIOR abd_parent_id = abd_area_id
UNION
SELECT CONCAT(dcd_id,'') AS id, dcd_seq as seq, dcd_name AS name, CONCAT('c_',dcd_area_id) AS pid , null as deviceType, 'image/control.png' AS icon FROM dor_door_control_device WHERE dcd_cus_number = :cusNumber AND dcd_target_type = 2
ORDER BY seq

item.sql: SELECT dbd_id, dbd_name, dbd_dvc_addrs, dbd_stts_indc, dbd_stts_indc AS dbd_stts_indc_name FROM dor_door_base_dtls

SELECT '1-'||odd_id id, '1-'||odd_parent_id pid, odd_name name, 'org.png' icon, null dbd_other_id, null dbd_ctrl_id, null dbd_area_id, null dbd_type, null dbd_brand, null dbd_stts_indc, null dbd_ctrl_chl, null dbd_dvc_addrs, null dbd_dvc_stts, null orgid, null dbd_dept_id, 0 type, odd_seq seq FROM sys_org_dept_dtls
WHERE level < ? START WITH odd_id=? CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id = odd_parent_id UNION ALL SELECT id, pid, name, icon, dbd_other_id , dbd_ctrl_id , dbd_area_id , dbd_type , dbd_brand , dbd_stts_indc , dbd_ctrl_chl , dbd_dvc_addrs , dbd_dvc_stts , orgid, dbd_dept_id , type, seq FROM ( SELECT ''||dbd_id id, '1-'||dbd_area_id pid, dbd_name name, 'door.png' icon, dbd_other_id , dbd_ctrl_id , dbd_area_id , dbd_type , dbd_brand , dbd_stts_indc , dbd_ctrl_chl , dbd_dvc_addrs , dbd_dvc_stts , dbd_cus_number orgid, dbd_dept_id , 1 type, dbd_seq seq FROM dor_door_base_dtls UNION ALL SELECT '1-'||abd_area_id id, '1-'||abd_parent_id pid, abd_area_name name, 'area.png' icon, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, abd_cus_number orgid , null , 0 type , abd_seq seq FROM com_area_base_dtls )t

UPDATE dor_door_base_dtls SET dbd_name =:name, dbd_other_id =:dbd_other_id, dbd_ctrl_id =:dbd_ctrl_id, dbd_type =:dbd_type, dbd_brand =:dbd_brand, dbd_stts_indc =:dbd_stts_indc, dbd_ctrl_chl =:dbd_ctrl_chl, dbd_dvc_addrs =:dbd_dvc_addrs, dbd_dvc_stts =:dbd_dvc_stts, dbd_area_id =:pid, dbd_dept_id =:dbd_dept_id, dbd_updt_user_id =:user_id, dbd_updt_time =sysdate WHERE dbd_id =:id

INSERT INTO dor_door_base_dtls ( dbd_id , dbd_name , dbd_other_id , dbd_ctrl_id , dbd_area_id , dbd_type , dbd_brand , dbd_stts_indc , dbd_ctrl_chl , dbd_dvc_addrs , dbd_dvc_stts , dbd_dept_id , dbd_crte_user_id , dbd_crte_time , dbd_seq , dbd_cus_number ) VALUES( :id, :name, :dbd_other_id, :dbd_ctrl_id, :pid, :dbd_type, :dbd_brand, :dbd_stts_indc, :dbd_ctrl_chl, :dbd_dvc_addrs, :dbd_dvc_stts, :dbd_dept_id, :user_id, SYSDATE, :id, :cusnumber )

SELECT '1-'||odd_id id, '1-'||odd_parent_id pid, odd_name name, null cus, null otherid, null dcd_ip_addrs, null dcd_port, null dcd_user_name, null dcd_user_password, null dcd_dept_id, 'org.png' icon, 0 type, odd_seq seq, -1 target FROM sys_org_dept_dtls WHERE LEVEL < ? START WITH odd_id=? CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id = odd_parent_id UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ''||dcd_id id, '1-'||dcd_area_id pid, dcd_name name, dcd_cus_number cus, dcd_other_id otherid, dcd_ip_addrs , dcd_port , dcd_user_name , dcd_user_password , dcd_dept_id , 'control.png' icon, 1 type, dcd_seq seq, dcd_target_type target FROM dor_door_control_device UNION ALL SELECT '1-'||abd_area_id id, '1-'||abd_parent_id pid, abd_area_name name, abd_cus_number cus, null, null, null, null, null, null, 'area.png' icon, 0 type, abd_seq seq, -1 target FROM com_area_base_dtls )t
WHERE t.cus=?
ORDER BY seq

INSERT INTO dor_door_control_device (dcd_cus_number, dcd_id, dcd_name, dcd_ip_addrs, dcd_port, dcd_user_name, dcd_user_password, dcd_dept_id, dcd_area_id, dcd_crte_time, dcd_crte_user_id, dcd_other_id, dcd_target_type ) VALUES (:cusnumber, :id, :name, :dcd_ip_addrs, :dcd_port, :dcd_user_name, :dcd_user_password, :dcd_dept_id, :pid, sysdate, :user_id, :otherid, :target )

UPDATE dor_door_control_device SET dcd_name = :name, dcd_ip_addrs = :dcd_ip_addrs, dcd_port = :dcd_port, dcd_user_name = :dcd_user_name, dcd_user_password = :dcd_user_password, dcd_dept_id = :dcd_dept_id, dcd_area_id = :pid, dcd_updt_time = SYSDATE, dcd_updt_user_id = :user_id, dcd_other_id =:otherid, dcd_target_type =:target WHERE dcd_id = :id
